Richmond Avenue, west side, between Signs Road and Rockland Avenue, showing the Emmanuel Lutheran Church.

April, 1929

P. L. Sperr

150 Signs Road, north side, west of Richmond Avenue, showing an old farmhouse. It belonged to Mrs. M. D. Vroom in 1874; to Robert and Henry Vroom and Mrs. S. Brown in 1898, and to Charles E. Griffith and Son in 1907. The view is east toward Richmond Avenue.

June 29, 1933

P. L. Sperr

The rear of the house, looking westward. On the extreme right is seen the Asbury Methodist Episcopal Church, on Richmond Avenue.

June 29, 1933

P. L. Sperr

Another view of the rear of the house and the driveway.

June 29, 1933

P. L. Sperr
